document.full_text: japanese teenager hideki matsuyama has enjoyed a dream run at this week's masters where he is playing mainly to bring joy to the victims of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami in his country.
document.title: hideki matsuyama fulfils pledge to give japan augusta joy
lines_and_colors: japanese teenager hideki matsuyama has enjoyed a dream run at this week's masters where he is playing mainly to bring joy to the victims of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami in his country.
